org.jruyi.core

Interface IScheduler.IConfiguration

  • Enclosing interface:
    IScheduler

    public static interface IScheduler.IConfiguration
    This interface defines the methods to configure a scheduler.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply()
      Applies this configuration to the associated scheduler service.
      int numberOfThreads()
      Returns the number of threads used to run tasks.
      IScheduler.IConfiguration numberOfThreads(int numberOfThreads)
      Sets the number of threads that the associated scheduler uses to run tasks.
      int terminationWaitTimeInSeconds()
      Returns the time in seconds to wait on termination of the associated scheduler service.
      IScheduler.IConfiguration terminationWaitTimeInSeconds(int terminationWaitTimeInSeconds)
      Sets the time in seconds to wait on termination of the associated scheduler service.

    • Method Detail

      • numberOfThreads

        IScheduler.IConfiguration numberOfThreads(int numberOfThreads)
        Sets the number of threads that the associated scheduler uses to run tasks.
        Parameters:
        numberOfThreads - the number of thread to set
        Returns:
        this configuration object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if numberOfThreads is non-positive.

      • terminationWaitTimeInSeconds

        IScheduler.IConfiguration terminationWaitTimeInSeconds(int terminationWaitTimeInSeconds)
        Sets the time in seconds to wait on termination of the associated scheduler service.
        Parameters:
        terminationWaitTimeInSeconds - the time to set
        Returns:
        this configuration object

        Returns the number of threads used to run tasks.
        Returns:
        the number of threads

      • terminationWaitTimeInSeconds

        int terminationWaitTimeInSeconds()
        Returns the time in seconds to wait on termination of the associated scheduler service.
